comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
API Changes:
- `SKAlphaType` now has `Unknown` like the C++
  - other values increased by 1
- `SKBitmap` now has decoding methods
  - `Decode` and `DecodeBounds`
- `SKImageDecoder` is now replaced with `SKCodec` (it was deprecated, now removed entirely)
- `SKColorType` now has extra items
- `SKColorType` no longer has the `N_32`, but rather `SKImageInfo.PlatformColorType`

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
@migueldeicaza I am busy doing the last bits for the merge

All the code is done, but I am just getting it to build on CI and all that. I am hoping tonight the merge will be done.
